dt: {bc}to guide (something or someone, such as an airplane, its pilot, or a missile) in flight by means of a radioed vector
{bc}to change the direction of (the thrust of a jet engine) for steering

shortdef: to guide (something or someone, such as an airplane, its pilot, or a missile) in flight by means of a radioed vector
to change the direction of (the thrust of a jet engine) for steering
